title: Please help me to identify the font used in this logo
content:
Hi, I am having a nightmare job trying to identify the font used to design these logos. I am trying to re-make a copy of 1 of these logos so that vinyl cutting software can vector the image properly (at the moment the software goes a bit haywire and doesnt trace the image correctly)  
The logo was originally designed by a friend, but I am currently unable to get a hold of him to ask him what the font is, so if anybody can identify the font it would be very much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823032846im_/http:/typophile.com/files/adrenaline%20stompers%20logos_5778.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823032846im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo1%20(3)_6311.jpg)
